text: Rho Cassiopeiae is a yellow hypergiant star, the brightest one in the night sky. It is located in the constellation Cassiopeia. It is also one of the largest, with a size 450 times larger than the Sun, but the star's mass is just 22 times larger than the Sun ==Information== *Mass: 22 Solar Masses *Radius: 636-981 Solar Radius *Luminosity: 320,000-530,000 Solar Luminosities *Temperature: 4,571-6,044 Kelvin *Spectral Type: F8Ia+-K0Ia+ Category:Hypergiants Category:Variable stars
title: Rho Cassiopeiae
